This game is so awesome where can I play the first one? Can't even imagine how good that game could be. Hopefully it has all the epic features of this game like the store, Battlepass (bonus if it doesn't give Overwatch Coins), and the very cheap single player (bonus if it doesn't have progression).

Bought the game like 2-3 years ago, the game was amazing back then, when you could just go in and play ranked or with your friends.

But the times has changed, now Blizzard (ugh, can't even say that company) is just money grabbing from people. Back then [b]EVEN[/b] tho there were lootboxes, you could grind those skins in game.
Now, they're trying to just make you to pay for those ugly skins. It's not even worth it, because most of the basic skins are like 10$ rn. The player base is even worse than in the original Overwatch ( That must say a lot) so it's even more not playable.

I just wish this company was bought out, so they would stop making those horrible decisions.

TL;DR : Don't play this game. You can have fun for like 2-3h, but after that you'll be so dissapointed that words can't describe that.

zum Spiel an sich:

RESE√ëA SERIA SI QUIERES EMPEZAR A JUGAR OVERWATCH 2 (Pros y Contras):
PROS:
- El juego es variado y din√°mico, si te gusta la variedad y no aburrirte de jugar lo mismo. Este es tu juego
- El juego y las partidas son r√°pidas, si eres una persona que busca algo diferente a los tactical shoters lentos. Dale una oportunidad a este juego.
- Gr√°ficamente y artisticamente es increible, es de los mejores actualmente en este sector.
- No es "El mismo juego 2", tengo 1k horas en este juego y en lo unico que se parece en el overwatch 1 es en la "estetica grafica" (Y eso que ha cambiado bastante en este temporada)
- El gameplay es super variado, si te aburres de jugar un personaje, lo cambias. Si te aburres de jugar un Rol, lo cambias. Puedes estar mucho tiempo haciendo esto y no aburrirte.
- Es √∫nico es su g√©nero. Ningun juego se le compara en la actualidad, la gente que dice que se parece al TF2 o al Paladins es porque simplemente no ha jugado overwatch lo suficiente.
- La gente que le tira rese√±as negativas son principalmente Fanboys de TF2 o gente que repudia blizzard (ME INCLUYO). Pero desligando la empresa del juego. Este juego no es malo EN NINGUN ASPECTO.
- Puedes conseguir skins y cosmeticos legendarios (Los mas guapos del juego) Completamente gratis
- Puedes farmear monedas premium y comprarte el pase de batalla completamente gratis.
CONTRAS:
- El juego se centra en el PvP, si te interesaste para jugar el modo historia lamento informarte que este no son mas que misiones (Que estan guapas, pero no valen los 15 dolares que cuestan)
- El modo historia (Donde se expande el Lore del juego) es de paga 15 Dolares
- El juego puede ser dificil de entender si nunca haz jugado un juego del genero.
- No hay servidores de habla hispana en latinoamerica (SOLO BRASIL) (Ojo: el ping es decente)
- Si quieres el personaje nuevo de cada temporada, tienes que farmear al nivel 40 para tenerlo gratis o Pagar tus 10 dolares del pase de batalla.

Y listo en Resumen, el juego esta GUAPISIMO, si nunca haz jugado un juego de este estilo te recomendaria probarlo. No se dejen llevar por las rese√±as negativas (La comunidad de TF2 Es super toxica) (Tengo 700 horas en TF2)

If you love a dev team that doesn't know what they're doing with their game, then you'd absolutely love Overwatch 2(minus the promised PvE that was supposed to be highly replayable with skill trees). We have everything from unbalanced heroes, unfixed bugs(that are often game breaking) that are still present even from launch, terrible monetization, and lack of communication from the team itself. Will any of these issues be fixed in the near future? Well I think that's an ActBlizz, "Soon‚Ñ¢" to be quite honest, so no lol. Please stay very very far away from this game, trust me, you'd be doing yourself a favor. I've been playing Overwatch since Overwatch 1 open beta days so I easily have 4k+ hours and its honestly been really sad to see a game I loved turn to shit.

Es la sombra del primer juego en cuanto a novedad y desde que se volvi√≥ F2P tiene un asco de monetizaci√≥n, pero ey, sigue siendo muy divertido, competitivo y ahora gratis, por lo que no hace falta darles dinero si no te gusta su nueva monetizaci√≥n abusiva o no cumplen al 100% con el contenido prometido. Como mucho compra el pase por el PvE y ya.

El gameplay 5v5 me gusta much√≠simo m√°s que el 6v6 al igual que muchos cambios pasivos a los roles y personajes. El matchmaking en competitivo me sigue dando un poco de asco por lo imbalanceado que est√°, en el primero tampoco era perfecto, pero en el 2 las partidas est√°n decididas de manera brutal antes si quiera de empezar.

En cuanto al PvE, obviamente existe (aunque las redes diga lo contrario) solo que "recortado" de lo prometido (√°rbol de habilidades) y a trozos por temporadas

Have played a lot over at battle.net. I understand the frustration with blizzard but review bombing a game because of that is questionable. 

If you want an opinion on the game not blizzard heres one.
Right now this game is one of a kind. Overwatch is a hero shooter with a heavy focus on teamwork. Even for a free to play player this is an amazing game. All heroes are unlockable within a month. This game is getting regular updates and new content. The shop only offers cosmetics and this is not a pay to win game. Only skill matters. 

If you love shooters, teamwork, and movement. Try this game with an open mind. I cant stress this enough try it with an open mind. There are no other game like this right now on the market.

overwatch 1 veteran since public beta. 

this game claims to be a sequel to Overwatch 1, boasting PVE contents such as skill trees and unique storylines. 

regrettably, blizzard failed to deliver on their promises. In fact, this game is virtually indistinguishable from the now-defunct Overwatch 1, and at times, it even seems worse. 

and now available on steam just for one purpose:  persuade their investors that their product still has a future. As a f2p game, MAU and download figures will appear in the financial statement, but negative reviews like this one won't (I own the battle.net version of OW2 and specifically downloaded the Steam version just to leave a review). As matter of fact, i dont think they care about negative reviews at all.

this game is a warped product of blizzard' obsession, inflated greed, arrogant avarice, blind ambition, and sheer mediocrity.\
